## Checklist

- [ ] Entry follows the format: `- [Name](URL) - Description starting with uppercase, ending with period.`
- [ ] Link has been verified and is accessible
- [ ] Entry is placed in the correct category
- [ ] Entry is placed alphabetically within its category
- [ ] No duplicate entries
- [ ] Description is concise (under 120 characters)
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
